00037 #include "NG_NetworkMessage.h"
00038 #include <vector>
00039 
00040 class NG_NetworkDeviceInterface
00041 {
00042 private:
00043     // candidates for shared/common implementation class
00044     bool m_online;
00045 public:
00046     NG_NetworkDeviceInterface() {};
00047     virtual ~NG_NetworkDeviceInterface() {};
00048 
00049     virtual void NextFrame()=0;
00050 
00054     void Online(void) { m_online = true; }
00058     void Offline(void) { m_online = false; }
00062     bool IsOnline(void) { return m_online; }
00063 
00064     virtual bool Connect(char *address, unsigned int port, char *password,
00065                          unsigned int localport, unsigned int timeout)=0;
00066     virtual bool Disconnect(void)=0;
00067 
00068     virtual void SendNetworkMessage(NG_NetworkMessage* msg)=0;
00074     virtual std::vector<NG_NetworkMessage*> RetrieveNetworkMessages()=0;

00076     
00077 #ifdef WITH_CXX_GUARDEDALLOC
